title: NAC (N-Acetyl Cysteine)
description:
NAC is anti-inflammatory, & helps to replenish stores of glutathione, the body's master antioxidant. It supports natural detoxification pathways, promotes brain health, & may reduce the risk of heart diseease.

NAC has been shown to improve lupus, multiple sclerosis, & more. (PubMed, PubMed, Healthline).
